VIII.iv.4.B.2.h
.
SMC Under PL 90-77
PL 90-77
, effective October 1, 1967
provided for the payment of SMC
for each disability that met the criteria under
38 U.S.C. 1114(k)
, and
under both
38 U.S.C. 1114(s)
and
38 U.S.C. 1114(k)
, and
removed the prohibition against using an additional disability, ratable as 50 percent disabling, to justify awarding an intermediate rate under
38 U.S.C. 1114(p)
, when the same disability had been used as the basis for establishing entitlement to SMC under
38 U.S.C. 1114(k)
.
